summary: Caught in the middle of a bank robbery, a slacker and a bank employee become the ones who arbitrate the intense situation.
cast: Nick Stahl|Erika Christensen|Gavin Rossdale|Terry Crews|David Carradine|Leo Fitzpatrick|Adriano Aragon|Britt Delano|Chris Lerude|Renee Cohen|Nicolo Dorian|Silke Fernald|Sabrina Machado|Kristin Wallace
keywords: tape gag|tape over mouth|broken camera|security camera|heist
title: How to Rob a Bank (and 10 Tips to Actually Get Away with It)
